title: "Cars"
---

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
fun_thing <- ggplot(data = mtcars, mapping = aes(y = hp,
              x = mpg,
              text = mpg)) + 
  geom_point(color = "violetred",)+
  labs(x = "Miles per Gallon",
       y = "Horse power")

ggplotly(fun_thing, tooltip = "text")
```
